source_objects.title: Management
source_objects.description: Take your management skills to the next level with these course in negotiation, leadership, people management and more.

items.title: Google Drive - Beginner to Expert
items.headline: The most complete Google Drive course from a best selling instructor. No prior knowledge required.
objectives_summary: Understand and use Google Drive to improve efficiency in storing and sharing files

items.title: Data Management Essentials
items.headline: Turn your company into a data-driven organization with the professional course in Data Management!
objectives_summary: Transforming your organization into a data-driven reality
Have a 360° view of how data fits into organizational processes and activities
Understand data architectures, metadata, data quality, business intelligence and big data

items.title: Be a Lean Construction Leader
items.headline: Easy to understand systems for improving any construction project
objectives_summary: A Lean process that is being adopted by the Construction Industry called the P4 Planning System

items.title: Essentials of Effective Key Account Management
items.headline: A guide to excel in Key Account Management -Learn Account Development Strategy, P&L Management, Change Management & More
objectives_summary: Techniques and nuances of all the essential skills required in key account management role.
Account Development strategy and portfolio management
Profit & Loss management of portfolio of accounts

items.headline: Without any Tool
objectives_summary: Mining Association Rules
Clustering Technique
Classification Technique

items.title: Quality System Problem Solving 7x
items.headline: Learn 7 Problem Solving's Techniques directly from the world of Quality Systems in less than one hour
objectives_summary: 7 Quality System's techniques
The problem solver's focus
Why a Corrective Action is so important

items.title: Healthcare Kaizen: Continuous Improvement for Everyone

visible_instructors.job_title: Author, Speaker, Consultant, ThedaCare Center Faculty Member
visible_instructors.title: Mark Graban
visible_instructors.name: Mark

items.headline: Taught by Mark Graban, co-author of "Healthcare Kaizen" and author of "Lean Hospitals"
objectives_summary: Understand core Kaizen concepts and terminology
Articulate and use the basic terms and concepts of Kaizen
Understand and start practicing some basic Kaizen methods

items.title: Essential Leadership Skills for the New Manager
items.headline: Get the leadership skills you need to succeed. Take charge, build Influence and make great things happen as a new leader
objectives_summary: Build trust and communicate effectively in a way that establishes authority as a leader while inspiring individual and team achievement
Boost your communication power by adding key verbal and non-verbal communications skills
Establish a clear vision and concrete goals, develop simple executable plans, and delegate effectively to get them done

items.title: Value Stream Mapping
items.headline: What better way to experience Value Stream Mapping online but through a hand drawn video!
objectives_summary: Learn how to create a high quality value stream map
Learn the complete lifecycle of a Value Stream Mapping event

items.title: ISO 22000:2018 Food Safety Management Systems (FSMS)
items.headline: In-depth look into Food Safety Management Systems - An internationally recognised standard of food safety
objectives_summary: Introduction and general concepts of ISO 22000:2018
Clause-by-clause guidance of ISO 22000:2018
What applicable requirements are needed for food manufacturers?

items.title: Motivational Techniques To Improve Your Team Success
items.headline: Learn principles & practices of intrinsic motivators for team success; autonomy, mastery & purpose
objectives_summary: Autonomy and giving teams the freedom to self-organise in ways that improve team motivation
The importance of mastery in teams and how it incentivises teams and individuals to work harder
The power of purpose and how it generates sustainable level of intrinsic team motivation

items.title: 7 Easy Steps to Plan/Upgrade to ISO 9001:2015

visible_instructors.title: Hassan Nedadahandeh
visible_instructors.name: Hassan
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Engineer (P.Eng), Lead Auditor, QA Manager

items.headline: Learn how to plan and implement or upgrade to ISO 9001:2015 via several easy to understand templates.
objectives_summary: Get all necessary Knowledge and skills to plan and implement quality management system according to ISO 9001:2015
Be able to upgrade the current management system
Be able to establish a quality management system in your own organization or in an assumptive organization from scratch.

items.title: Restaurant Inventory Management
items.headline: Master Inventory.  Save Money.  Succeed.
objectives_summary: How to reduce inventory costs through operations and pricing strategies

items.title: Theory of Constraints (TOC) & its Applications -Crash Course
items.headline: Focus and achieve MORE !
objectives_summary: Why our efforts do not translate into results
The fundamental concepts of Theory of constraints (TOC)
How to find the constraint that blocks the performance and how to manage it for imrovement
